Key Match Events: V. Tikoipau scored the first goal for Tonga at 27 minutes.
H. Polovili scored a penalty for Tonga at 39 minutes.
T. Kumsuz scored for Cook Islands at 63 minutes.
C. Kefu scored the final goal for Tonga at 79 minutes.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at J.S. Blatter Football Complex Tuanaimato Field 1, Apia.
First half score was 0-2 in favor of Tonga.
Final score was 1-3 in favor of Tonga.
